nodes.text: The Angor system was a star system located in the galaxy. It was in close proximity to the Outer Rim world of Dantooine and the Sinsang system.

The Angor system was first mentioned in the new Star Wars canon in the thirty-seventh issue of De Agostini's Star Wars: Build the Millennium Falcon magazine, published around September 16, 2015. The star system was first mentioned in the Star Wars Legends continuity in The New Jedi Order: Vector Prime, a 1999 novel authored by R. A. Salvatore.
